topic.title: Plugin Monetization
topic.p: Monetizing a plugin can be a great way to make a profit that will allow you to invest in the further development of your plugin. Please explore the following business models and select the one you'd like to proceed with:

li.p: If you want to keep offering your plugin for free, you can still earn some money by accepting donations.
If you don't want to go fully paid, you can offer some features at no cost in addition to paid features.
If you are ready to go fully paid, there are 2 options for you:

list.li: Paid-via-JetBrains (revenue sharing model) when the plugin is sold via JetBrains Marketplace. (Recommended)
Paid-via-Vendor (no revenue sharing, third-party license keys) when the plugin is sold via Vendor.
